content:
Hi @Hamish MacDonald/ All - Im in and happy to join the FHIR Africa channel.
@Emeka Chukwu - Hello, I recently joined The Sovereignty Network and work with Hamish. If you can, please include me in the 5th July Zoom meeting.
Hi @Desi Nair great. Will do. Look forward to the meeting on Monday.
Great to see you here, @Desi Nair . I know your experience and perspective in building and delivering African digital health technologies is going to add a lot of value.
